prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Bass, Reed, Piano, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Reed, Guitar, and Bass, but no Drums.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Bass, Reed, and Piano, but without Drums.

Style 3:
No Drums are included in this song, which is made up of Piano, Reed, Guitar, and Bass.
